subject: Sushi is a traditional dish originating from which country?

What type of bread is traditionally used to make a Croque Monsieur, a French grilled ham and cheese sandwich?
correctAnswer: Pain de mie (similar to white sandwich bread)

subject: Hummus, a dip or spread made from cooked, mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic, is a popular dish in which region?

correctAnswer: Spinach (or other leafy greens like mustard greens)
